tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_data (
 crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crime_type VARCHAR(255),
 crime_location VARCHAR(255),
 crime_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crimes (
   crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   crime_type VARCHAR(255),
   location VARCHAR(255),
   crime_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
   suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   address VARCHAR(255),
   crime_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id)
)

CREATE TABLE crime_analysis (
   analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crime_id INT,
   analysis_date DATE,
   analysis_result TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id)
)

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255),
    crime_date DATE,
    crime_location VARCHAR(255),
    crime_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name VARCHAR(255),
    suspect_alias VARCHAR(255),
    suspect_dob DATE,
    suspect_gender VARCHAR(10),
    suspect_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id UUID,
    suspect_id UUID,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE law_enforcement (
    officer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_name VARCHAR(255),
    officer_rank VARCHAR(50),
    officer_department VARCHAR(255),
    officer_badge_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_status VARCHAR(50)
);
